summary: Do you like harry potter? If so, in what house would manu fit better and why?
question: Do you like harry potter? If so, in what house would manu fit better and why?
answer:
oh wow, that’s interesting. yes, I do like Harry Potter.

I guess that his house is Slytherin. he’s determined and even stubborn, energy and knows how to achieve his goals, ambitious and smart. maybe he’s cunning (what is not necessarily bad). I suppose that it’s difficult for him letting people close, he keeps at a distance (not because he’s president now, but because it’s just his nature) but if you become friends, he is very loyal.

and also, have you ever seen how perfect green suits him?? 😏

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their...
body:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

summary: @silkoversteel asked me a while ago if I could read something in German, and suggested a part of “Harry Potter and the Prisoner...
track_name: Harry Potter and the German of Azkaban
caption:
@silkoversteel asked me a while ago if I could read something in German, and suggested a part of “Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban” - which gave me a bit of a headache. Turns out, my German editions don’t have numbered chapters, so I had to look up online what chapter this was, and then crossproof with an English version to find the right spot.

(Basically, this is Prisoner of Azkaban, chapter 15, the Quidditch finale, right before Draco grabs Harry’s broom, up until Harry catches the Golden Snitch.)

Then I had to get my laptop to accept my microphone. Because I have a new mic, and my laptop was like “???”, so…yeah. But it worked in the end. I use a gaming headset, btw, because there were no good mics available where I live, at least not those that are in my budget.

Not my best reading, but hey, if you wanna hear me speak German with a hint of Luxembourgish accent? Here you go!

Recorded and edited with Audacity.

summary: Hello I would love to create a fic rec Tumblr but I'm a complete ignorant of how this site works... I tried to find some tuto...
body:
Hello I would love to create a fic rec Tumblr but I’m a complete ignorant of how this site works… I tried to find some tuto but I without great success… I would love to have some help as how to organize the tags of the fic + presentation/design + links

Anyways if someone as the time or know some website which explain everything, it would be of great help ^^ thank you & have a good day !

They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

blog.description: Look, at some point I'm going to have to admit to myself that I enjoyed Cursed Child. Scorbus should be canon tho.

tags: source: it's always sunny in philadelphia
summary:
Polly: Where's Albus, Scorpius?
Scorpius: We just stepped out of the shower. He'll be down in a minute.
Polly: Alright, li-...
body:
Polly: Where’s Albus, Scorpius?

Scorpius: We just stepped out of the shower. He’ll be down in a minute.

Polly: Alright, li- listen, you guys can’t go… did you just say we?

Scorpius: What?

Polly: Did you just say “we just stepped out of the shower”?

Scorpius: I said “he.”

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: i just love that harry’s first conversation with a snake isn’t like a life-or-death situation, it’s literally just “hey you...
body: i just love that harry’s first conversation with a snake isn’t like a life-or-death situation, it’s literally just “hey you locked up? yeah it sucks doesn’t it. wanna go slithering around london, i can do that for you”

reblog.comment: i just love that harry’s first conversation with a snake isn’t like a life-or-death situation, it’s literally just “hey you locked up? yeah it sucks doesn’t it. wanna go slithering around london, i can do that for you”

trail.content_raw: i just love that harry’s first conversation with a snake isn’t like a life-or-death situation, it’s literally just “hey you locked up? yeah it sucks doesn’t it. wanna go slithering around london, i can do that for you”
trail.content: i just love that harry’s first conversation with a snake isn’t like a life-or-death situation, it’s literally just “hey you locked up? yeah it sucks doesn’t it. wanna go slithering around london, i can do that for you”
